text: The Lapiths besieged Dodoma and demanded, to lift it up, that all the virgins of the city be given over to them for one night. The cruel demand was accepted. At night a band of innocent girls arrived at the siege camp, the oldest of whom would not be more than eight years old. Realizing that it was a ploy, the lapites, who were not affected by pedophilia, entered Dodoma in sackcloth, slaughtered all men and raped all women, a ferocity that allowed them to know that no such ploy had ever existed. FIN
title: La virginidad escasea
author: Marco Denevi
